trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a control designer requires a preview instance of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너는 디자인 타임에 컨트롤의 미리 보기 인스턴스를 필요한 지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Apply the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute to a control designer class to indicate the type of preview control that is supported by the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너에서 지원 되는 미리 보기 컨트롤의 형식을 지정 하기 위해 컨트롤 디자이너 클래스를 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 특성을 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to change a preview control for design-time rendering without affecting the actual persisted instance of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 실제 저장 된 인스턴스에 영향을 주지 않고 디자인 타임 렌더링에 대 한 미리 보기 컨트롤을 변경 하려면이 특성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute when declaring a custom designer class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 에서 파생 된 사용자 지정 디자이너 클래스를 선언할 때는 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 지정 일반적으로

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property for the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>기본 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>멤버</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> 에 대 한 동작을 결정 하는 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 특성에 대 한 속성</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> 의 값

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>속성을 `true` 디자이너 연결된 된 컨트롤의 임시 복사본을 사용 하 여 디자인 타임 HTML을 생성 하 나타내기 위해.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 임시 컨트롤에 대 한 변경 내용이 유지 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>속성을 `false` 디자이너 컨트롤 인스턴스, 특히 반환을 나타내기 위해는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>속성에서는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 개체의 변경 내용은 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner> class is marked with the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner>클래스가로 설정 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute로 표시 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer uses the preview control with the automatic style formatting task, which allows the user to preview various autoformat stylesthat can be applied to the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 미리 보기 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 자동 스타일을 다양 한 자동 서식 stylesthat를 미리 볼 수 있는 서식 지정 작업 일정에 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: As the user selects different autoformat styles in the user interface, the selected style scheme is applied to the preview control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 사용자 인터페이스에서 다른 자동 서식 스타일을 선택 미리 보기 컨트롤에 선택 된 스타일 구성표가 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Applying a new style to the preview control does not change the scheme that is applied to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 미리 보기 컨트롤을 새 스타일을 적용 인스턴스의에 적용 되는 체계는 변경 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>디자이너의 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너 선언에는 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 지정 되지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>동작은를 지정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>으로 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Designer classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members, and ignore the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 디자이너 클래스에서 파생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>멤버 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 특성을 무시 하 고.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To determine the expected behavior for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>, see the reference documentation for the derived control designer class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>파생된 컨트롤 디자이너 클래스에 대 한 참조 설명서를 참조 하는,</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> 및</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> 에 대 한 예상 되는 동작을 확인 하려면

trans-unit.source: For general information about using attributes, see [Attributes Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) and [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 특성을 사용 하는 방법에 대 한 일반 정보를 참조 하십시오. [특성 개요](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) 및 [특성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about design-time attributes, see [Attributes and Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임 특성에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [특성 및 디자인 타임 지원](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class and sets the initial value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*> property.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> 의 초기 값을 설정 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만들 필요가 없습니다 일반적으로 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>클래스를 직접.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> to the class declaration of the custom control designer in the source code.
trans-unit.target: 적용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>소스 코드에서 사용자 지정 컨트롤 디자이너의 클래스 선언에.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The initial value to assign for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*> 할당할 초기 값

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class that is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> 클래스 기본 미리 보기 값으로 설정 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 필드는 읽기 전용입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the Default field is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>기본 필드의 속성이로 설정 되어 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method to determine whether the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>확인할 수 있는 방법은 여부에 대 한 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>속성이 기본 미리 보기 값으로 설정 되어.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same preview attribute setting as the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체의 현재 인스턴스와 동일한 미리 보기 특성 설정의 나타내는지 여부를 결정은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Equals method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Equals 메서드 재정의 <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Equals method compares two instances based on the value of their <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equals 메서드의 값에 기반 하는 두 인스턴스를 비교 합니다. 자신의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스와 비교할 개체를 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: if obj is a attribute and its value is the same as this instance of ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 obj 는 의이 인스턴스와 같은 특성 및 값은 , 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 메서드 재정의 <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 메서드 따라 동일한 두 개체에 대해 동일한 해시 코드를 생성 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as hash tables.
trans-unit.target: 해시 코드는 해시 알고리즘 및 데이터 해시 테이블 같은 구조에 사용 하기에 적합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에 대 한 부호 있는 32 비트 정수 해시 코드를 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class is set to the default preview attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다 여부의 현재 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> 클래스 기본 미리 보기 특성 값으로 설정 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The IsDefaultAttribute method compares the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object with the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> field.
trans-unit.target: IsDefaultAttribute 메서드 비교에 대 한 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>현재 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>에 대 한 값을 가진 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>정적 속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default>필드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> is equal to the default preview attribute value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우의 현재 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> 기본 미리 보기 특성 값과 같지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer requires a temporary preview control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너에서 임시 미리 보기 컨트롤 디자인 타임에 필요한 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify a value for the SupportsPreviewControl property by applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute to a custom designer class declaration.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로, SupportsPreviewControl 속성의 값을 적용 하 여 지정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>특성을 사용자 지정 디자이너 클래스 선언.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SupportsPreviewControl property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>특성의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>기본 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 의 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>멤버</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> 에 대 한 동작을 결정</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> 하는 것에 대 한 SupportsPreviewControl 속성의 값

trans-unit.source: Set the SupportsPreviewControl property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: SupportsPreviewControl 속성을 설정 `true` 를 나타내는 디자이너 연결된 된 컨트롤의 임시 복사본을 사용 하 여 디자인 타임 HTML을 생성 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 임시 컨트롤에 대 한 변경 내용이 유지 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Set the SupportsPreviewControl property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SupportsPreviewControl 속성을 설정 `false` 디자이너 컨트롤 인스턴스, 특히 반환을 나타내기 위해는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>속성에서는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 개체의 변경 내용은 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control for design-time preview; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer uses an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> control that is contained in the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>디자이너에서 디자인 타임 미리 보기에 대 한 연결된 된 컨트롤의 임시 복사본을 사용 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 디자이너의 인스턴스를 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>디자이너에 포함 된 컨트롤.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>
